title: BRIEF-Crew Energy Qtrly ‍Shr $0.02​
text: March 1, 2018 / 9:17 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Crew Energy Qtrly ‍Shr $0.02​ Reuters Staff March 1 (Reuters) - Crew Energy Inc: * . ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS AND EXECUTIVE APPOINTMENT * QTRLY ‍SHR $0.02​ * QTRLY ‍PETROLEUM AND NATURAL GAS SALES OF $60.1 MILLION VERSUS $55.1 MILLION * QTRLY ADJUSTED FUNDS FLOW $0.22 PER DILUTED SHARE * PRODUCTION IN Q4 2017 AVERAGED 25,270 BOE PER DAY, 13% HIGHER THAN Q4 2016 AND 9% HIGHER THAN Q3 2017 * SEES 2018 CAPITAL BUDGET OF $80 TO $85 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$0.03 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
